articles.description: Spray foam insulation was previously subsidised in England under the government's Green Homes Grant scheme.
articles.title: Major lenders reject homes with spray foam insulation

articles.description: Monday's papers feature Joe Biden lifting the ban on Ukraine using US arms to strike Russia and a burglary on a royal estate.
articles.title: Newspaper headlines: US 'lifts ban' on strikes in Russia and royal 'raid'

articles.description: The move is a major change in US policy after months of entreaties from Kyiv.
articles.title: Biden allows Ukraine to strike inside Russia with long-range missiles

articles.description: Sweden said the new advice follows a worsening security situation, by which it means the war in Ukraine.
articles.title: Sweden, Finland and Norway release new advice on surviving war

articles.description: A force announces it is looking for Pankaj Lamba after the body of Harshita Brella was found.
articles.title: Police search for husband of Harshita Brella

articles.description: Starmer's farmer-alarmer in the Budget could crystalise anger over ministers’ perceived ignorance about agricultural life.
articles.title: Will Labour's inheritance tax on farms come home to roost?

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Lidia Thorpe has been rebuked by the Senate for yelling "not my King" during a protest last month.
articles.title: Lidia Thorpe: Australia senator censured for 'not my King' heckle

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The last of 22,000 personnel who witnessed the UK’s nuclear bomb tests want answers from the PM.
articles.title: 'Starmer, meet us before it's too late' say nuclear test veterans

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A pub worker warns failures in the Ask for Angela safety scheme could put vulnerable women at risk.
articles.title: Ask for Angela: Staff had no clue, says pub worker

articles.description: Around 630,000 women are waiting for gynaecology appointments as waiting lists double in four years.
articles.title: Gynaecology waiting lists in UK double, leaving women in pain
